TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_RʉhlʉcʉHaising, title = RʉhlʉcʉHaising, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/RʉhlʉcʉHaising} }

S.FORM: == Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising == u sulit nu Hulam 高中部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Kaohsiung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising. u kasalumaluma' nu Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising sa, 169 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 574 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 521 ku tademaw, pakalatu 91%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 53 ku tademaw, pakalatu 9%. u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 65%, Rukay(Rukai) 1%, Cou 5%, Paywan(Paiwan) 6%, Laaluwa(Hla'alua) 11%, Pangcha(Amis) 2%, zumazuma 1%.0 u Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad

== Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising == o solit no Holam 高中部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Kaohsiong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising. o kasalomaloma' no Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising sa, 169 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 574 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 521 ko tademaw, pakalato 91%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 53 ko tademaw, pakalato 9%. o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 65%, Rokay(Rokai) 1%, Coo 5%, Paywan(Paiwan) 6%, Laalowa(Hla'aloa) 11%, Pangcha(Amis) 2%, zomazoma 1%.0 o Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad
